snippet: The decision by the Basel Committee for Banking Supervision is the latest sign of how regulators have become more willing to accommodate banks as the focus switches to helping economies recover.
abstract: Basel Committee for Banking Supervision will ease new rule, meant to rein in risky balance sheets starting in 2018, in effort to avoid tightening financing; decision is latest sign of how regulators have become more willing to accommodate banks as focus switches to helping economies recover.
lead_paragraph: The decision by the Basel Committee for Banking Supervision is the latest sign of how regulators have become more willing to accommodate banks as the focus switches to helping economies recover.

headline.main: Global Banking Regulators Agree to Ease Capital Rule
